news.title: ‘Very difficult’ travel conditions and some homes without power after torrential rain
news.summary: Met Éireann is warning of very heavy rain, thunder and widespread flooding in several counties on Monday.

news.title: Pat Spillane: One All-Ireland medal so far is underwhelming for the greatest player of all time
news.summary: The ingredients were all there for a brilliant match between Donegal and Meath in the All-Ireland semi-final.

news.title: ‘It is absolutely not a front’ – former ‘major gangland player’ Shane Lyons now running mafia-themed restaurant in Dublin
news.summary: A convicted criminal who was previously classified by gardaí as being a major gangland player is now running a mafia-themed restaurant in the capital’s south inner city.

news.title: Ryanair may increase bonus paid to staff for catching flyers with oversized bags, Michael O’Leary says
news.summary: Ryanair is considering increasing a bonus paid to staff for identifying passengers’ oversized luggage, its chief executive Michael O’Leary has said.

news.title: Cork cancel All-Ireland homecoming in the wake of calamitous final implosion
news.summary: Cork GAA has cancelled plans for an official homecoming in the aftermath of Sunday’s calamitous All-Ireland hurling final collapse.

news.title: Jason Willick: Trump now risks being impaled on Epstein conspiracy hook he helped bait
news.summary: Some political frauds have a rational endgame.

news.title: Funeral mass of Irish Daily Star and Irish Mirror photographer Mick O’Neill hears how he was ‘irreplaceable’
news.summary: The funeral mass of award-winning  Irish Daily Star  and  Irish Mirror  photographer Mick O’Neill, who died last weekend in a motorbike accident, has heard how he was a “special” man, mentor and friend who “had a great effect on people”.

news.title: Ask Allison: My daughter was excluded by pals because I don’t allow social media. I’m furious their mums didn’t intervene
news.summary: My husband and I have been in a friend group with three other couples since our now 14-year-old children were in preschool. The three girls were all great friends until they were about 11 or 12 and then there was a bit of a division. Two of the girls remained friendly, and the other, my daughter, was left on the outside.

news.title: Dear Vicki: My staff have become over-reliant on AI. How do I get them to use it appropriately?
news.summary: Staff throughout my organisation are pretty much using ChatGPT all the time. They claim it’s a ‘research tool’ and a good way to test ideas. But I’m worried that some people are just cutting and pasting stuff directly from AI, without doing further checks.

news.title: Granddaughter ‘left heartbroken’ after solicitor’s misconduct led to pensioner’s €19,000 nursing home bill going unpaid
news.summary: Serious failings by a lawyer left an elderly man’s granddaughter “heartbroken” and unable to access funds to pay his nursing home bills.
